[Work in progress. Not yet ready for public consumption]

Visualization tools for NLP machine learning models.

* Free software: BSD 3-Clause License

Installation
============

::

    pip install ecco


Documentation
=============


To use the project:

.. code-block:: python

    import ecco
    ecco.longest()
